name: Generic PLA @Tronxy X5SA
filament_start_gcode:
; Filament: PLA
; Pressure Advance: Tune with Klipper (start ~0.04 for direct drive)
; SET_PRESSURE_ADVANCE ADVANCE=0.04
filament_notes:
Generic PLA profile for Tronxy X5SA with Klipper

Print Temperature: 210-215°C (adjust based on brand)
Bed Temperature: 60°C
Cooling: Enable part cooling fan after layer 1, full speed by layer 3

Retraction Settings (Firmware Controlled):
- Distance: 1.0mm (configured in Klipper firmware_retraction)
- Speed: 40mm/s
- Z-hop: 0.2mm
- These values shown here for reference only; actual retraction controlled by Klipper

Pressure Advance:
- Start with 0.04 for direct drive Titan clone
- Fine-tune using Klipper calibration: https://www.klipper3d.org/Pressure_Advance.html
- Add to filament_start_gcode: SET_PRESSURE_ADVANCE ADVANCE=0.04

Speed Guidelines:
- Perimeters: 60-80 mm/s
- Infill: 100-150 mm/s
- First layer: 30 mm/s
- Overhangs: 30-40 mm/s

Cooling:
- PLA benefits from aggressive cooling
- Min speed: 20% for bridging and overhangs
- Max speed: 100% for small features

Tips:
- Ensure filament is dry (store in sealed container with desiccant)
- For best results, calibrate flow ratio per filament brand
- Z-offset: Adjust in Klipper for perfect first layer squish
